Class Axis

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xclcharts.renderer.axis.Axis
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RoundAxis, XYAxis

    public class Axis
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    XiongChuanLiang
    (xcl_168@aliyun.com)
    ClassName:
    Axis
    Description:
    轴(axis)基类，定义了刻度，标签，等的属性
